testcase.classname: Ability to log into Pro Web
testcase.name: 01 Entering Pro Web
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login with the correct details username and password...................passed Then The main homepage loads successfully...................................passed And There is a box called Campaigns.........................................passed And Log Out button exist....................................................passed And LogOut ProteusWeb from Home Page........................................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to log into Pro Web
testcase.name: 02 Entering Pro Web with incorrect details
testcase.system-out: Given I am a Proteus User...................................................passed And I have the role: Pro Web Campaigns......................................passed And I go to the Proteus Home URL in my browser..............................passed When Login with the incorrect details username and password.................passed Then An error message displayed advising to try again.......................passed

testcase.classname: Ability to log into Pro Web
testcase.name: 03 Campaigns page loaded
